Text.val: 19.12.2013 SH SCR18565 Button Ledger bookings: Changed IBAN/Bankaccount number on screen
14.03.2013 GB SCR17995 Replaced screen button load logic by GB901
22.01.2012 SH SCR17880 Task "Value date Table" Fixed error SQL0338 “JOIN predicate not valid”
26.11.2012 JH SCR17709 Removed casts from direct SQL
22.03.2012 SH SCR17182 Replaced GM900 by GB900 (program permission)
07.04.2010 SH SCR15415 Prevent SQL error if 00.00.0000 is entered as date
11.06.2007 AK SCR12619 removed CR/LF from titel strings in task'Display payment'
02.12.2005 SH SCR9670 Extended selection of BADP with BNKA_CODETYPEACCOUNT
23.11.2005 SH SCR9566 Added BDTL_BANKACCOUNT to tabular view "LedgerBookings"
22.11.2005 SH SCR9495 Added LGCD_ADMNO to tabular view "LedgerBookings"
-- Variables uses for tabular view "Ledger bookings"
Inherit authorisation from parent task - OPH410A
Only allow subtask to be accessed as long as no other action initiated

SQL_STMT_U.val: SELECT BADT.BADT_HANDLINGDATE, BADT_BANK_ADMNO, BADT_BANK_LEDG_NO, BANK_NAME, BANK_CURRENCY, cast(sum (BADT.BADT_NPAYMENTS) as decimal(9,0)), cast(sum (BADT.BADT_DEBITSACCCURR) as decimal(13,2)), cast(sum(BADT.BADT_CREDITSACCCURR) as decimal(13,2)), cast(sum (BADT.BADT_MUTDAILYSTATEMENTS) as decimal(13,2)), count(*) as NUMBER_OF_ACOUNT_STATEMENTS FROM :1/BADT AS BADT, :1/BANK AS BANK, :1/ADMU AS ADMU WHERE BADT.BADT_HANDLINGDATE BETWEEN ':2' and ':3'and BANK.BANK_ADMNO = BADT.BADT_BANK_ADMNO and BANK.BANK_LEDG_NO = BADT.BADT_BANK_LEDG_NO and BADT.BADT_BANK_ADMNO = ADMU.ADMU_ADMNO and ADMU_ALLOW_QUERY_BANK = 'Y' and ADMU_HUSR_ID = ':4' GROUP BY BADT.BADT_HANDLINGDATE, BADT_BANK_ADMNO, BADT_BANK_LEDG_NO, BANK_NAME, BANK_CURRENCY ORDER BY BADT_BANK_LEDG_NO, BADT_BANK_ADMNO for fetch only

Text.val: -- Reset variables uses for Ledger bookings

SQL_STMT_U.val: SELECT BADP.BADP_PAYMENTVALUEDATE as BADP_PAYMENTVALUEDATE,cast((sum(abs(BADP_AMOUNTACCCURR))-sum(BADP_AMOUNTACCCURR))/2 as decimal (13,2)) as Debit,cast((sum(abs(BADP_AMOUNTACCCURR))-sum(BADP_AMOUNTACCCURR))/2+sum(BADP_AMOUNTACCCURR)as decimal(13,2)) as Credit FROM :1/BADT AS BADT cross join :1/BNKA AS BNKA left join :1/BADP AS BADP on BADP_BANK_ADMNO =BADT_BANK_ADMNO and BADP_BANK_LEDG_NO =BADT_BANK_LEDG_NO and BADP_BANKID= BADT_BANKID and BADP_BANKACCOUNT = BADT_BANKACCOUNT and BADP_DATDAILYSTATEMENT = BADT_DATDAILYSTATEMENT and BADP_DAILYRUNNUMBER = BADT_DAILYRUNNUMBER WHERE BADT.BADT_HANDLINGDATE BETWEEN ':2' and ':3' and BADT_BANK_ADMNO = :4 and BADT_BANK_LEDG_NO = :5 and BNKA_BANK_ADMNO = BADT_BANK_ADMNO and BNKA_BANK_LEDG_NO = BADT_BANK_LEDG_NO and BNKA_BANKID = BADT_BANKID and BNKA_BANKACCOUNT = BADT_BANKACCOUNT and BNKA_CODETYPEACCOUNT <>6 GROUP BY BADP.BADP_PAYMENTVALUEDATE ORDER BY BADP.BADP_PAYMENTVALUEDATE for fetch only

select LGCD_ADMNO, LGCD_LDGR_NO,BDTL_BANKID, BDTL_BANKACCOUNT, BADT_IBAN, LGCD_AMOUNTDEBITH, LGCD_AMOUNTCREDITH from :1/lgcd, :1/bdtl, :1/badt where LGCD_LGCH_ID= BDTL_LGCH_ID and BADT_BANK_ADMNO = :2 and BADT_BANK_LEDG_NO = :3 and BADT_HANDLINGDATE = ':4' and BDTL_BANK_ADMNO = BADT_BANK_ADMNO and BDTL_BANK_LEDG_NO = BADT_BANK_LEDG_NO and BDTL_BANKID = BADT_BANKID and BDTL_BANKACCOUNT = BADT_BANKACCOUNT and BDTL_DATDAILYSTATEMENT = BADT_DATDAILYSTATEMENT and BDTL_DAILYRUNNUMBER = BADT_DAILYRUNNUMBER order by LGCD_LDGR_NO for fetch only optimize for 100 rows
